subject: Golf
Solheim Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The 12-player American and European teams for the Solheim Cup, a biennial match-play competition, will be determined after the next three L.P.G.A. events.
snippet: The 12-player American and European teams for the Solheim Cup, a biennial match-play competition, will be determined after the next three L.P.G.A. events.
